vsParam:
[px], have you heard of it?
A new antique is found the other day!

Oh! What antique is that?
I am curious! ... Huh?
Hey~ Logy! Where are you going?

Mmm... [px], and you guys.
You've heard of the antique, right?

Yeah. We were just talking about it!
What's happening with that antique?

According to the plan, it would be sent to the Academy for
study, but the time has passed and it hasn't arrived.

Perhaps the people escorting it are extremely careful since it's an
antique, but it's also possible that something bad has happened.

I happen to be free right now,
so I am going to check it out.
It's going to be bad if something really happens.
Can you handle it by yourself?

Yeah. I just want to figure out the situation as soon as possible.
I hope that I am just thinking too much.

Ha-ha, as long as it's nothing big, I can handle it by myself...
Huh, do you guys...

In this case, we'll go with you!
We can be your helpers if something happens, right?

No, you have to take your lessons... But,
you will not listen to me, will you...

I am sure we can help!
Ah, um. It's not because we want to see that antique!

Ha-ha, thank you. Come with me then.
Let's search for the carriage along the road.

... Huh? Look! There's a carriage parked over there.
Perhaps it's the carriage escorting the antique!

Uncle, uncle!
Are you delivering goods to the Academy?

Yes. There are something to be delivered to the Academy.
Are you students of the Academy? I am so sorry...

Looks like you are in trouble,
what's going on?

The carriage became lighter, so I checked it and realized that the
top of the carriage is broken and some cargos have dropped.

I plan to mend the hole,
and pick up the dropped cargos.
I, it means that... the antique is?

What! That cargo is an antique?
And I just dropped it...

You came from that direction, right?
Let's go check it out, and retrieve the rest of the cargos.
Thank you, I really appreciate it!

There's only one cargo to be found!
Uh? This is the last one, right?

Yeah! It is, and the antique is inside!
... It's not damaged. Great!

Oh, so this is the antique.
We also have this kind of things in Bressisle.

Yeah. We'll study the history in depth by investigating these
antiques, and apply them in modern technologies.

I see. We study the antiques for the same
purpose in our world.

Your world also studies antiques, Logy?
I bet the antiques in the old era are very valuable for research!

Ah, no. Instead of studying, we "investigate" them.
We'd disassemble them and then analyze their structures.
I didn't know that antiques can be disassembled...

It's not destroying... We restore the antiques back to the state
of their materials, so that we can investigate their structures.

Although it's called disassembling, we don't divide them into
parts, we restore them back to the state of their materials.

But, this world doesn't have the necessary disassembling
equipment, so I can't do it...

D, disassemble into materials...
Can you change it back then!?

Yeah. Our research aims to find out the recipes of the antiques
by disassembling them, and then recreate them with alchemy.

Disassembling the antiques into materials,
and then restore them with the recipes... That's so amazing!

How developed is alchemy in Logy's world
compared to ours?

The alchemy in this world is pretty developed,
I believe that you'll be able to do the same thing very soon.

I, is that so!? [px]!
We're counting on you!

Ah, ah ha ha. Anis' enthusiasm just got ignited...
That's a heavy responsibility, [px]...
